name: Treasury Trouble
description:
(refresh if web version is just a black screen)

This is my Jam entry for LD44. You play as the CEO of your very own treasury! Unfortunatley, a buncha thieves decided to ruin your day. They won't hurt you, but they will take your money, and what's a treasury CEO without money? How long will you last?

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Attack: Left Click
  • Quit: Esc

Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/treasury-trouble

Source: https://github.com/jiink/treasury-trouble (don't make fun of my commit messages)

OSX version untested
